scripts.start: yarn run build:dev && concurrently -k -p '[{name}]' -n 'TypeScript,React' -c 'yellow.bold,cyan.bold,green.bold' "yarn run server:dev" "yarn run craco start"
scripts.build:dev: yarn run clean && tsc --noEmit false --module commonjs
scripts.server:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development BUILD_ENV=development concurrently -k -p '[{name}]' -n 'TypeScript,Node' -c 'yellow.bold,cyan.bold,green.bold' "yarn run server:dev:watch-build" "yarn run server:dev:watch-server"
